entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
